docs.lead_paragraph: International A3-16 RIGHTISTS LEAD ITALY VOTE A media magnate who is a newcomer to politics and his right-wing allies appeared to be winning national elections in Italy that had been seen as a vehicle for renewal after years of corruption. A1
docs.snippet: International A3-16  RIGHTISTS LEAD ITALY VOTE  A media magnate who is a newcomer to politics and his right-wing allies appeared to be winning national elections in Italy that had been seen as a vehicle for renewal after years of corruption.  A1
